price: Zar pomoći možeš onome kome su njegova ružna djela uljepšana, a i on ih smatra lijepim?! Allah, doista, kome hoće daje da je u zabludi, a na Pravi put upućuje koga hoće, pa ne izgaraj od žalosti za njima; Allah, doista, dobro zna sve što oni čine.
arabic: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ فَرَءَاهُ حَسَنٗاۖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۖ فَلَا تَذۡهَبۡ نَفۡسُكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسَرَٰتٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَصۡنَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: afaman zuyyina lahu sūu ʿamalihi faraāhu ḥasanan fa-inna al-laha yuḍillu man yashāu wayahdī man yashāu falā tadhhab nafsuka ʿalayhim ḥasarātin inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā yaṣnaʿūna
